body.p: A authors-element is a reference to a file with authors. The definition-element may contain any number of authors-elements.

tr.td: Location of the file with authors. The location is corrected for pathfragments.
If not set, the encoding of the using module is assumed.

body.p: and the file, allauthors.xml may look like this:
body.pre: Student 2005 ]]>
body.p: The content of a fragment element may be a simple text or any legal XML-fragment wrapped as CDATA.
